price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: ‘’Adeε fua pε na mede tu mo foͻ, εne sε mobεgyina hͻ mmienu mmienu ne mfuamfua ama Nyankopͻn na afei moadwen (Muhammad ho abakͻsεm a ͻne mo de te kuro yi mu ha ho). Mo yͻnko (Muhammad) no ͻmmͻͻ dam, na mmom ͻyε kͻkͻbͻni ma mo wͻ asotwee denden a εda (onipa ne Jinn) anim no ho.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَعِظُكُم بِوَٰحِدَةٍۖ أَن تَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ مَثۡنَىٰ وَفُرَٰدَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُواْۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ لَّكُم بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul innamā aʿiẓukum biwāḥidatin an taqūmū lillahi mathnā wafurādā thumma tatafakkarū mā biṣāḥibikum min jinnatin in huwa illā nadhīrun lakum bayna yaday ʿadhābin shadīdin
